popupWelcomeText.message: Chrome Clip is a Chrome browser extension for clipping web content.

popupDescriptionText.message: Clipped content can be viewed and managed in the plugin's sidebar.

popupSignInButton.description: Popup page sign in button text

popupOpenHomepageAriaLabel.description: Popup page open homepage button aria-label

floatBtnBookmarkToggleTooltip.description: Floating button - tooltip for the toggle clipping mode icon

floatBtnSaveTypeAllPage.description: Floating button - option for clipping entire page

floatBtnSaveTypeAllPageAI.description: Floating button - option for AI clipping entire page

floatBtnSaveTypeSelect.description: Floating button - option for clipping selected content

floatBtnSaveTypeSelectAI.description: Floating button - option for AI clipping selected content

floatBtnLoadingAIProcessing.description: Floating button - loading indicator for AI processing

floatBtnLoadingSaving.description: Floating button - loading indicator for saving

floatBtnSettingsHideOnce.description: Floating button - option to hide until next visit

floatBtnSettingsDisableSite.description: Floating button - option to disable on this site

floatBtnSettingsDisableGlobal.description: Floating button - option to disable globally

floatBtnSettingsReenableTip.description: Floating button - tip for re-enabling settings

floatBtnNotificationClipSuccess.description: Floating button - notification for successful clipping

floatBtnNotificationPictureContaining.description: For indicating the number of images

floatBtnNotificationSaveFailed.description: Floating button - notification for save failed

floatBtnNotificationAlreadySaved.description: Floating button - notification for current page already saved

floatBtnNotificationAllPageSaveSuccess.description: Floating button - notification for successful direct saving of entire page

floatBtnNotificationRestoringOriginal.description: Floating button - notification for restoring original text

floatBtnFloatingWindowOpenFailed.description: Floating button - notification for floating window open failed

floatBtnNotificationAIProcessing.description: Floating button - notification for AI processing
